mapper.update: update th_versioncontrol set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createby = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, `type`, url, introduction, createby, createTime, deleted, `level`, num from th_versioncontrol where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
